item.title: MIUI OS1.0.18.0.UGUCNXM Fastboot update for Redmi 14R 5G China
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Redmi 14R 5G China

Codename: flame

Version: OS1.0.18.0.UGUCNXM | 14.0

Size: 6.0 GB

MD5: 473d81b8120e2adf08b0996ccda06ef1

Changelog:
[System]
Optimization: System stability
Fix: Couldn't send SIM card activation SMS after performing a factory reset
Fix: Items were displayed incorrectly in some cases
Updated the security patch to August 2025. Increased system security.

Download: Here
